name: intro_0
value: ((""),("Welcome to Solar Tech Corp!",light_purple))

name: intro_1
value: ((""),("Last week, we were attacked by ghosts, ",light_purple))

name: intro_2
value: ((""),("so we decided to improve our security system.",light_purple))

name: intro_3
value: ((""),("To do that, we want to use a new technology of ours called Bluestone.",light_purple))

name: intro_4
value: ((""),("We need you to help us test its capabilities.",light_purple))

name: level_1_0
value: ((""),("Bluestone works like Redstone, but with an unlimited distance.",light_purple))

name: level_1_1
value: ((""),("Your goal is to power the Bluestone lamp.",light_purple))

name: level_2_1
value: ((""),("This is an AND-Gate.",light_purple))

name: level_2_2
value: ((""),("It outputs ON when its left AND right side are ON.",light_purple))

name: level_3_1
value: ((""),("This is a NOT-Gate.",light_purple))

name: level_3_2
value: ((""),("It inverses the power it receives.",light_purple))

name: level_4_1
value: ((""),("This is an OR-Gate.",light_purple))

name: level_4_2
value: ((""),("It outputs ON when its left OR right side is ON.",light_purple))

name: level_6_1
value: ((""),("This is an XOR-Gate.",light_purple))

name: level_6_2
value: ((""),("It outputs ON when it receives only one ON signal.",light_purple))

name: level_8_1
value: ((""),("This is a Multiplexer. ",light_purple))

name: level_8_2
value: ((""),("If the underside is OFF, it will copy and output the LEFT signal.",light_purple))

name: level_8_3
value: ((""),("If the underside is ON, it will copy and output the RIGHT signal.",light_purple))

name: level_10_1
value: ((""),("This is a D-Flip-Flop.",light_purple))

name: level_10_2
value: ((""),("It's one of the most complex gates, so listen closely.",light_purple))

name: level_10_3
value: ((""),("You see the little arrow on it?",light_purple))

name: level_10_4
value: ((""),("When the side with the arrow switches from OFF to ON,",light_purple))

name: level_10_5
value: ((""),("It will copy and output the signal from the other side.",light_purple))

name: level_10_6
value: ((""),("The output will not change until the side with the arrow switches from OFF to ON.",light_purple))

name: level_40_1
value: ((""),("This is a D-Latch.",light_purple))

name: level_40_2
value: ((""),("You see the little E on it?",light_purple))

name: level_40_3
value: ((""),("When the side with the E is ON,",light_purple))

name: level_40_4
value: ((""),("it will copy and output the signal of the other side.",light_purple))

name: level_40_5
value: ((""),("The output will remain the same if the E side is OFF.",light_purple))

name: level_50_1
value: ((""),("Congratulations, you completed all the tests!",light_purple))

name: level_50_2
value: ((""),("Goodbye!",light_purple))

name: cable
value: ((""),("This is a Cable.",light_purple))

name: button
value: ((""),("This is a Button. You can press it.",light_purple))

name: constant
value: ((""),("This is a Constant. Its output does not change.",light_purple))

name: clock_0
value: ((""),("This is a clock. ",light_purple))

name: clock_1
value: ((""),("Its output changes every second.",light_purple))

name: nothing
value: ((""),("Look at a Bluestone component for more information.",light_purple))

name: language_set
value: ((""),("Language set to English.",white))

name: no_reset
value: ((""),("This map does not have a reset system. If you wish to play again, please reinstall the map.",red))
